rooms.name: Entrance Hallway & Verandah
rooms.description: A spacious verandah that serves as the entrance with natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows. It acts as a transitional space between the garden and interior.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A central living area with an open design and large floor-to-ceiling windows to allow ample natural light. Incorporates local Kerala architectural elements such as tiled roofs and wooden beams.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room for ease of entertaining guests, designed with traditional Kerala-style woodwork.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: Compact kitchen area integrated into the ground floor. Uses local materials and features an open plan to allow connectivity with the dining area.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Elevated entrance that aligns with Vastu principles for positive energy flow. Includes large floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance illumination.

openings.name: Garden Window
openings.description: Provides a view of the garden from within the living space. The placement ensures ample natural ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.
